channel.title: Multiple Accounts in Whonix Workstation
channel.description:
I have several different things I want to use Whonix for, and I made several accounts using adduser.
How do I log out of the "user" account and into one of the others. I've looked through the documentation, and I don't see anything on this, and I see no "logout" option on any of the desktop menus.
Am I also guaranteed that accounts other than user funnel all network activity through Tor?
Thanks.

item.title: Multiple Accounts in Whonix Workstation
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Security wise you are a lot better of using single user user and this:

Whonix

Multiple Whonix-Workstations

Compartmentalization. Better separation of different tasks and/or pseudonyms by using multiple Whonix-Workstations.

Read full topic

item.title: Multiple Accounts in Whonix Workstation
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

While I have to say that I literally can’t see any reason to use different accounts on the Workstation since Stream Isolation seperates connections any ways and sharing Whonix isn’t recommended, you may log out via the “Log Out Button” under Leave.

Have a nice day,

Ego

Read full topic
